title: SurveyMonkey Clone
description: It is a leading Survey platform around the globe. It lets it's users to create sophisticated surveys using expert templates.A collaboration project where I was responsible for the following tasks :
functions: Creation of various pages of the website including the homepage and dashboard
Creating the navbar, footer, and some page components
Styling and making the pages responsive along with the login/signup page

title: JioMart Clone
description: It is one of the India's top E-commerce Website.It deals with a wide variety of products including groceries,fashion,electronics,etc.. . Implemented the following functions :
functions: Signup through mobile number using live OTP(used firebase )
Logout
Add to cart
Sorting/Filtering
Billing
techStack: React | JavaScript | Chakra UI | Firebase | CSS

title: MailTest
description: Mailtest is a test mail server solution that allows testing email notifications. A collaboration project where I was responsible for the following tasks/functions :
functions: Creating the navbar, footer, and some page components
Styling and making the pages responsive along with the login/signup page
Login/Signup through Github, Google, Facebook and Email
Email Verification
Password Reset
Update UserName
Delete Account
techStack: React | TypeScript | Chakra UI | Firebase | CSS

title: HealthStone
description: It is an E-commerce website, which deals in medicine, health packages and labtest tests. A collaboration project where I was responsible for the following tasks/functions :
functions: Creating the navbar, footer, and some page components
Creating the homepage
Styling and making the pages responsive along with the login/signup page
Login/Signup though phonenumber
Admin functionlaity with role base authentication
Role base access to the database for updatation on products
techStack: React | TypeScript | Firebase  | Chakra UI | Tailwind CSS | MongoDB | Express | NodeJS
